import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Calculator extends Component { state = { display: 0 } firstNum = "" secondNum = "" submit = (num) => { this.firstNum = "" + this.firstNum + num this.setState( {display: this.firstNum} ) let animal = "dar/ffe" let regex = /[-+*\/]/ let result = animal.match(regex); console.log(result) } render() { return(

{this.state.display}

) } } export default Calculator
